node.excerpt: tl;dr A usual problem CMS like WordPress are useful for people without technical skills but also for very dynamic website. People usually want something big instead of having something consistent. Now it's my website, I will try to be consistent as…

frontmatter.title: New Website powered with Gatsby
frontmatter.author: romain-dary
frontmatter.excerpt: New website – new tools. I've created a lot of website a while ago. As an auto-entrepreneur, as a CTO @eoko, for customers, for friends and now... just for me. I moved from Joomla, Drupal and finally I also moved from Wordpress 8 years ago for nice, handcraft website.

frontmatter.title: Should I write a technical blog
frontmatter.author: romain-dary
frontmatter.excerpt: As you do not know, I'm french. So, it's a really bad start for being fluent in English. I also try to improve myself everyday and I practice everything I'm interested in. Maybe starting to write in English is not a so terrible idea for me and
